summary: This bill, the Improving Child Care for Working Families Act of 2025, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion limit for dependent care assistance programs. Specifically, it increases the exclusion limit in Section 129(a)(2)(A) from $7,500 ($3,750 for single filers) to $10,500. The amendments apply to amounts paid or incurred in calendar years beginning after the bill's enactment.
